summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 10.8°C) and feels like temperature (down 10.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 358 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 259 m), and outside humidity (down 6%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, dry and less humid conditions and winds should remain light. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dark. The weather will likely remain the same.
